title: The Majesty of Magnificat
description: Under the baton of the legendary Anton Armstrong, this evening features Taylor Scott Davis’ breathtaking Magnificat, a radiant and uplifting work that captures the essence of faith and musical artistry. The program also includes Nubia Jaime-Donjuan’s Tundra and Robert Sheldon’s energetic Metroplex: Three Postcards from Manhattan, performed by an exceptional ensemble of musicians.
address: Carnegie Hall, 57th Street and Seventh Avenue, New York, NY

title: A Tapestry of Sound and Spirit
description: This electrifying program spans centuries and genres, weaving together classical masterworks, gospel traditions, and symphonic brilliance. Featuring Vivaldi’s Gloria and Robert Ray’s Gospel Mass, alongside powerful selections performed by the Florida Gulf Coast University Wind Orchestra and the Octavo Series Chorus, this evening will uplift and inspire.
address: Carnegie Hall, 57th Street and Seventh Avenue, New York, NY
